price: 1 Tout ce qui se trouve dans les cieux et sur la terre célèbre la gloire d’Allah, le Souverain, le Saint, le Tout-Puissant, l’infiniment Sage.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ ٱلۡقُدُّوسِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi al-maliki al-qudūsi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
